flounder.space

Class StructureGrid<T extends ISpatialObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.space.StructureGrid<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISpatialStructure<T>

    public class StructureGrid<T extends ISpatialObject>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISpatialStructure<T>
    Represents a 2D space with a grid.

        Creates a new grid.
        Parameters:
        tileSize - How much space each tile in the grid consumes
        width - How many tiles there are on x.
        height - How many tiles there are on y.
